_description: Christ’s work and our response — seven lines translating their Latin equivalents (f. 135v) in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
Sothliche with trewe sennes forsakinggeErliche with hastif penance
                    takingge…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…Openliche with good ensample in beringgeStedefastliche
                    with[outen] ony aȝen fallingge
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 58.
